title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze data, build models, and communicate insights using Python and SQL. Work with machine learning algorithms and statistical methods to extract meaningful patterns from large datasets.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Develop ML systems and deploy them into production using TensorFlow or PyTorch. Build and optimize neural networks, handle model training pipelines, and ensure scalability.

title: Backend Developer
description: Design REST APIs, manage databases, and ensure system scalability. Work with server-side technologies, implement authentication, and optimize database queries for performance.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Build responsive UIs using React and modern JavaScript frameworks. Create user-friendly interfaces, implement state management, and ensure cross-browser compatibility.

title: AI Research Assistant
description: Support research with data collection, experimentation, and model evaluation. Work on cutting-edge AI projects, conduct literature reviews, and assist in paper writing.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Develop both frontend and backend components of web applications. Work with React, Node.js, databases, and deploy applications to cloud platforms.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Automate deployment pipelines, manage cloud infrastructure, and ensure system reliability. Work with Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD tools, and monitoring systems.

title: Software Engineer
description: Design, develop, and maintain software applications. Write clean code, participate in code reviews, and collaborate with cross-functional teams.

title: Data Engineer
description: Build data pipelines, manage data warehouses, and ensure data quality. Work with ETL processes, big data technologies, and cloud data platforms.

title: Product Manager
description: Define product vision, gather requirements, and coordinate with engineering teams. Analyze market trends, prioritize features, and ensure successful product launches.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Create user-centered designs, conduct user research, and prototype interfaces. Work with design tools, collaborate with developers, and ensure excellent user experiences.

title: Cloud Architect
description: Design cloud infrastructure, optimize costs, and ensure scalability. Work with AWS, Azure, or GCP, implement best practices, and guide technical decisions.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Protect systems from security threats, conduct vulnerability assessments, and implement security measures. Monitor networks, respond to incidents, and ensure compliance.

title: Mobile Developer
description: Develop mobile applications for iOS or Android platforms. Work with Swift, Kotlin, or React Native, implement features, and ensure app performance.

title: Database Administrator
description: Manage databases, optimize queries, and ensure data integrity. Work with SQL and NoSQL databases, implement backups, and monitor performance.

title: Business Analyst
description: Analyze business requirements, create documentation, and bridge communication between stakeholders and technical teams. Conduct data analysis and support decision-making.

title: QA Engineer
description: Design test cases, execute manual and automated tests, and ensure software quality. Work with testing frameworks, report bugs, and collaborate with development teams.

title: Technical Writer
description: Create technical documentation, user guides, and API documentation. Communicate complex technical concepts clearly and maintain documentation standards.

title: System Administrator
description: Manage servers, networks, and IT infrastructure. Install software, monitor systems, troubleshoot issues, and ensure system availability.

title: Network Engineer
description: Design and maintain network infrastructure, configure routers and switches, and ensure network security. Troubleshoot connectivity issues and optimize network performance.
